summary: A Reykjavik pre-school teacher struggles to raise her daughter while selling casual sex to help make ends meet.
cast: Hera Hilmar|Thor Kristjansson|Þorsteinn Bachmann|Atli Oskar Fjalarsson|Ingvar Þórðarson|Valur Freyr Einarsson|Kristín Lea|Sveinn Ólafur Gunnarsson|Jóel Sæmundsson|Laufey Elíasdóttir|Theodór Júlíusson|Elma Lísa Gunnarsdóttir|Vigfús Þormar Gunnarsson|Elías Helgi Kofoed-Hansen|Þór Tulinius|Birgir Örn Steinarsson|Kristján Franklin Magnúss|Anna Svava Knútsdóttir|Gisli Gislason|Annalísa Hermannsdóttir|Lilja Guðrún Þorvaldsdóttir|Agust Bjarnason|Markus Reymann|Atsuko Sato|Ester Sveinbjarnardóttir|Hafdís Eva Pálsdóttir|Birgitta Sigursteinsdóttir|Höskuldur Sæmundsson|Don Ellione
title: Vonarstræti
